title: How Canva Keeps Its Image Metadata Fresh
author: Joab Jackson
description: With trendy new terms constantly entering the lexicon, Canva built an interactive data labeling pipeline to assure its collection of 40 billion stock images stays up to date. This Monster Scale Summit explains how it was done.
cntitle: Canva 如何保持其图像元数据的新鲜度
cndescription: 随着不断涌现的流行新词汇，Canva 构建了一个交互式数据标记管道，以确保其 400 亿张库存图片的集合保持最新。本次 Monster Scale Summit 峰会将解释这是如何实现的。（[Monster Scale Summit 峰会](https://www.example.com)）
